path_hints.hint: Graveyard is on the path to Arrghus
Ravio's Shop is on the path to Zaganaga
Lost Woods Area is on the path to Margomill
Thieves' Hideout is on the path to Dharkstare
Lorule Castle Area is on the path to Gemesaur King

always_hints.hint: Bouldering Guy has a Lost Maiamai.
Great Rupee Fairy has a Gold Rupee.
Haunted Grove Stump has a Piece of Heart.
Master Sword Pedestal has a Silver Rupee.
Queen Oren has a Purple Rupee.
Rosso (1) has the Bow of Light.
Thief Girl has a Lost Maiamai.

maiamai_hints.hint: Maiamai Boomerang Upgrade has an Empty Bottle.
Maiamai Bombs Upgrade has some Master Ore.
Maiamai Fire Rod Upgrade has a Silver Rupee.
Maiamai Bow Upgrade has a Piece of Heart.
Maiamai Sand Rod Upgrade has a Silver Rupee.

sometimes_hints.hint: [Mai] Lake Hylia Island Tile has a Red Rupee.
[DP] (2F) Under Rock (Left) has the Desert Palace Compass.
[Mai] Rosso's Ore Mine has a Lost Maiamai.
[SW] (B1) South Chest has a Silver Rupee.
[LC] Hook Trial (2) has a Lorule Castle Small Key.
[SW] (B1) Big Chest (Eyes) has a Lost Maiamai.
[TT] (B2) Eyegores has the Thieves' Hideout Compass.
[DP] (2F) Under Rock (Right) has a Purple Rupee.

hints.bow_of_light_hint: Did you find the Bow of Light in Lost Woods Area?
